title: Industrial Rev Black Country Image MCQ 3

content.description:
THE BLACK COUNTRY, ANONYMOUS ENGRAVING DEPICTING THE ENGLISH TOWN OF OLDBURY, CIRCA 1850

Historical Images Archive / Alamy Stock Photo
content.question: The technological processes reflected in the image had the most direct influence on which of the following?

choices.label: The beginnings of the decolonization movement
The rise of Japan in the Meiji era
The expansion of the Ottoman Empire

content.answer: The rise of Japan in the Meiji era

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
